resources.string: Automatically fill in text when an empty field is entered, if a Keepass2Android entry is available for the keyboard and there is a value which matches the field\'s hint text.
If a text field is filled by manually selecting the Keepass2Android value, remember which value was entered into the text field. The text field is later redetected by its hint text.
Show the simple 1-row keyboard if an entry is available for the keyboard. If disabled, a dialog is shown when the Keepass2Android key is pressed.
When pressing the Done/Send/Go key on the simple 1-row keyboard, automatically lock the database.
When pressing the Done/Send/Go key on the simple 1-row keyboard, switch the keyboard.
